mapper.select: SELECT *FROM employee e,employeeOrder eo,serviceOrder so,companyOrder co WHERE e.employeeID=eo.employeeID AND so.serviceOrderID=eo.serviceOrderID AND so.companyOrderID=co.companyOrderID AND e.employeeContractState=0 AND co.companyOrderNumber=#{companyOrderNumber}

SELECT *FROM employee e,employeeOrder eo,serviceOrder so,companyOrder co WHERE e.employeeID=eo.employeeID AND so.serviceOrderID=eo.serviceOrderID AND so.companyOrderID=co.companyOrderID AND e.employeeContractState=1 AND eo.employeeOrderState="未发" AND co.companyOrderNumber=#{companyOrderNumber}

SELECT *FROM employee e,employeeOrder eo,service s,serviceOrder so,companyOrder co WHERE e.employeeID=eo.employeeID AND so.serviceOrderID=eo.serviceOrderID AND so.serviceID=s.serviceID AND e.employeeContractState=0 AND so.companyOrderID=co.companyOrderID AND co.companyOrderNumber=#{companyOrderNumber} GROUP BY e.employeeID

SELECT *FROM employee e,employeeOrder eo,service s,serviceOrder so WHERE e.employeeID=eo.employeeID AND so.serviceOrderID=eo.serviceOrderID AND e.employeeContractState=0 AND so.serviceID=s.serviceID GROUP BY e.employeeID
SELECT *FROM ganenUser WHERE ganenName="${userName}" AND ganenPwd="${userPwd}"

SELECT *FROM employee e,employeeOrder eo,serviceOrder so,companyOrder co WHERE e.employeeID=eo.employeeID AND so.serviceOrderID=eo.serviceOrderID AND so.companyOrderID=co.companyOrderID AND e.employeeContractState=1 AND so.companyOrderID=co.companyOrderID AND co.companyOrderNumber=#{companyOrderNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET companyAdopt=1 WHERE companyID=#{companyID}
UPDATE employeeOrder eo SET eo.employeeOrderState="发放成功" WHERE eo.employeeID=#{employeeID}
UPDATE companyOrder SET companyOrderState="已完成" WHERE companyOrderNumber=#{companyOrderNumber}
UPDATE serviceOrder SET serviceOrderState="已完成" WHERE serviceOrderID=#{serviceOrderID}
